Click here to close. Settings will not be saved.
Close
Click here to apply your changes. Only newly created units will be named according to your settings.
Apply
Cancel the changes you made, for this Custom Preset
Cancel
Save the changes you made to this Custom Preset

Advanced Settings
Go here to change more advanced settings like range for city check, etc.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]NOTE:[ENDCOLOR] The name of the unit here is just for presentation purposes. The actual name of the unit will depend on player's current era, settings, and where it was born.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]NOTE:[ENDCOLOR] The name of the unit here is just for presentation purposes. The actual name of the unit will depend on player's current era, and settings.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your arrangement is incorrect. Reposition different parts of the name, so that different part of the name don't overlap each other.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your current settings could not find a name for the unit.[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]This mainly occurs whent the player has no city.
No Unit Number will be set
Unit Number will be tied to what you set as Combat Class, and Context. (Recommended)
Exactly like Dynamic, but without any suffix
Exactly like Dynamic, except written in Roman Numeral Form.
This basically counts how many units were created and its not tied to anything.
No Combat Class part of this name will be set
This part of the name is exactly the Unit Type

This part of the name is tied to the Combat Class of the unit.[NEWLINE] Recon: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Archer: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{2_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Siege: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{3_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Mounted: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{4_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Melee: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{5_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Gun: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{6_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Armor: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{7_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Naval Melee: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{8_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Naval Ranged: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{9_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Submarine: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{10_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Carrier: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{11_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Fighter: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{12_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Bomber: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{13_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Naval: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{14_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Helicopter: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{15_string}[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]
No Context Part of this name will be set
The Context Part of the name is tied to the city it was born in
The Context Part of the name is tied to the name of the Leader
The Context Part of the name is tied to the name of the Civilization
The Context Part of the name is tied to the Adjective of Civilization. Example: Moroccan, Indian, American
The Context Part of the name is always: "Regiment"
The Context Part of the name is always: "Division"
A Legion Title is assigned based on the city it was born in.

Number: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{1_description}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Combat Class: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_description}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Context: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{3_description}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]First Connector: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{4_description}[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Second Connector: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{5_description}[ENDCOLOR]
Show Era Preset Auto-Change Settings?
This setting allows the preset to change depending upon the era.[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]WARNING:[ENDCOLOR] This will only effect newly created units.
Ancient
Classical
Medieval
Renaissance
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Ancient Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Classical Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Medieval Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Renaissance Era[ENDCOLOR]
Industrial
Modern
Atomic
Information
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Industrial Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Modern Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Atomic Era[ENDCOLOR]
This preset is auto-applied when the player enters [COLOR_RESEARCH_STORED]Information Era[ENDCOLOR]
Compatibility Mode?

This is forces only one preset to be always active, and turns-off the auto-change preset feature. [NEWLINE]Enable this if you are using a [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Total Conversion[ENDCOLOR] mod, or any mod that changes the [COLOR_YELLOW]Eras.xml[ENDCOLOR]
City Check Range
This value sets how far a unit checks for a city.
Name units not belonging to you?

Units not belonging to you will also be named.[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]WARNING:[ENDCOLOR] Only enable this if you are also using my Add-On.[NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]WARNING:[ENDCOLOR] These units will be named according to [COLOR_YELLOW]YOUR[ENDCOLOR] relevant settings.
